CLUE: Italian painter known for his scenes of Venice, d. 1768
FOUND IN: Born in 1697 and passing away on August 13, 1768, Canaletto's works vividly illustrate the architectural grandeur and unique charm of Venice at a time when it was undergoing significant transformations due to its role as an important trading hub.
